ygData.subject: Pie tins
ygData.msgSnippet: Woo hoo!  Well, I have been one of those that had a moral argument against exploiting pottery for a long time.  I actually was one of the first to discover
ygData.messageBody:
Woo hoo! Well, I have been one of those that had a moral argument against
exploiting pottery for a long time. I actually was one of the first to
discover that it was profitable (long before there was a guide on EQvault).
I exploited it for one day (the day I learned about it) then quit because it
was too boring. Last night, I thought that I would try it once more just for
the heck of it. I went to HH (the best place to brew and pot, in case you
did not know) and spent two hours making about 25p an hour. There were at
least three other people there doing the same thing hehe. I also decided to
stock up on pie tins. AND I AM GLAD I DID! Pie tins as you all know sell
for a few silver. Well, after this patch, they sold for over 4g! I made 80p
in 25 seconds selling back the sketches hehe. Now if I just would have
bought more ;-)

Hawkwin of Hawkwin's Roaming Emporium
:hopes for another "enhancement" so he can make 200p in 50 seconds next time
;-)
